sqls.macro: <#macro device_4_all alias> ${alias}.id AS "deviceId", ${alias}.imei AS "deviceImei", ${alias}.name AS "deviceName", ${alias}.brand AS "deviceBrand", ${alias}.model AS "deviceModel", ${alias}.color AS "deviceColor", ${alias}.cpu AS "deviceCpu", ${alias}.screen_size AS "deviceScreenSize", ${alias}.os AS "deviceOs", ${alias}.xport_os AS "deviceXportOs", ${alias}.screen_size AS "deviceScreenSize", ${alias}.os_type AS "deviceOsType", ${alias}.price AS "devicePrice", ${alias}.state AS "deviceState", ${alias}.production_date AS "deviceProductionDate", ${alias}.reqair_reason AS "deviceReqairReason", ${alias}.scrap_reason AS "deviceScrapReason", ${alias}.createTime AS "createTime", ${alias}.editTime AS "editTime" </#macro> <#macro device_4_dto alias> ${alias}.id AS "deviceId", ${alias}.imei AS "deviceImei", ${alias}.name AS "deviceName", ${alias}.state AS "deviceState" </#macro>

sql.body: UPDATE DEVICE_BASE_INFO SET name =:name, brand = :brand, model = :model, color = :color, cpu = :cpu, memory_size = :memorySize, os = :os, xport_os = :xportOs, screen_size = :screenSize, os_type = :osType, price = :price, state = :state, production_date = :productionDate, reqair_reason = :reqairReason, scrap_reason = :scrapReason, editTime = NOW() WHERE imei = :imei
UPDATE DEVICE_BASE_INFO SET state = :state, editTime = NOW() WHERE imei = :imei
SELECT <@device_4_all alias="dev"/> FROM DEVICE_BASE_INFO dev WHERE dev.imei = :imei
SELECT <@device_4_all alias="dev"/> FROM DEVICE_BASE_INFO dev WHERE dev.id = :id
INSERT INTO yycomm.SEND_ORDER_LIS (tag, fromdeviceid, todeviceid, orderMSG, uuid, sendFlag, success, remark, createtime) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 0, 0, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
